title: Perma banned with no email
body:
Just got perma banned on my account with no reason at all and no email sent. I feel this was unjust as I never did anything that would give me a ban. Does anyone know how long it will  take for an email to go through or should I make a support ticket?

Account that got banned: http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=willobailin

replies.body: You should always hit up our account teams in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you ever have any questions or issues concerning your account. They'll be able to verify you as the creator, and then double check what is going on with the account and clear up any confusion.
